title: Why Charlie Puth is so famous? His songs are not that great. - Quora

response.answer_text: I disagree, Charlie Puth atleast to me seems to be the most talented musician out there (quite there with Bruno Mars) among major pop/rap stars like : Justin Bieber, Ed Sheeran, Drake, The Weeknd, etc……… The WHOLE WORLD literally everyone was gaga over Ed Sheeran’s “Shape of You”, Luis Fonsi’s “Despacito”, or even Kendrick Lamar’s “Humble” last year in 2017 mainstream music but I was gaga over Charlie’s “Attention” more so than Kendrick, Drake, Luis Fonsi, or Ed Sheeran. & This year while the whole world is gaga over Cardi B’s “I Like It”, or Drake’s “God’s Plan”, I again this year was most excited by Puth’s “The Way I Am”. Anyways love Charlie & his cool soothing melodic music !!!!! :) :) In his single, / song “Attention”, Charlie’s falsettos are just AMAZING to start off with while criticizing his ex-girlfriend in the song of being right there in every LA party where Puth goes by just to seek Puth’s attention   In his new single / song, “The Way I Am”, Puth at the start of the song complements his vocals / rap fast along with the beat, again the guy is a great singer / falsetto’s are amazing, & excellent ear for melody

Actually he isn’t really that famous compared to artists like Ed Sheeran, Shawn Mendes & Taylor Swift etc. The only reason he got popular was because of the collab on See You Again and We Don’t Talk Anymore, but other than his own hit “Attention” he really isn’t that popular in terms of pop artists. I could understand why the songs on Nine Track Mind (his debut album - 2016) weren’t that great, I definitely agree there were cheesy lyrics and the album was just a cluster of ideas mixed and mashed together. The worst song being Marvin Gaye, ughhhh. VoiceNotes is so much better in every single regard and really shows his artistry. “Attention” is the reason I love this lad.
